reviews.review_msg: Natalee is a fantastic teacher and mentor for anyone in counselling.  She expects a lot from her sutdents but in return gives a great deal and is always friendly, open and supportive.  Her supervision style is also really hands on-I learned TONS from her and continue to remember little "gems" that she passed on years later.
The prof is nice,but the text had nothing to do with what we went over in class.

Really great personality & energy, but REALLY BAD at tying the text into the course - we hadn't talked about ANYTHING in class that was on the final exam!!!  Plus, the course is waaay too hard for an undergrad course - she expects graduate level work... Super-nice person, though.
The lectures are irrelevant to final exam and the text. Never teaches anything from the text but expects students to know 'em.
